name: Gazaboo
description: Web based platform designed to simplify, save money and speed up buying and selling real estate - for all parties. This is largely confidential for now hence the ambiguity. Can discuss in meeting.

team.title: Cofounder
team.name: James H
team.bioHtml: Founder @Gazaboo • Worked at @Real Estate Private Equity

jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
As CTO, you will establish, implement and guide our technology strategy. This is an entrepreneurial role, and in time you'll build and lead a high-performing team with broad technological scope including, but not limited to, back-end & front-end development as well as managing external technology partnerships.

Initially you will be responsible for building an MVP to demonstrate the concept, with a view to raising capital post this stage.

The ideal candidate must have a demonstrable background in building and designing a propitiatory web based platform but most importantly be commercial and understand how any new code fits in to the overall business context and its strategy.

jobs.title: Tech Co-Founder / CTO
jobs.description:
As CTO / Tech Co-Founder, you will establish, implement and guide our technology strategy.

Initially, you will be responsible for building an MVP to demonstrate the concept, with a view to raising capital post this stage.

This is an entrepreneurial role, and in time you'll build and lead a high-performing team with broad technological scope including, but not limited to, back-end & front-end development as well as managing external technology partnerships.

The ideal candidate must have a demonstrable background in building and designing a propitiatory web based platform but most importantly be commercial and understand how any new code fits in to the overall business context and its strategy.

If you have full stack development skills, and are looking to build a business, then this could be the perfect opportunity for you.
